channel.title: ClickClickClick
channel.description:
Hello.
Since there is a request board i think i just make use of it. I would like to have a [url=http://ClickClickClick.com]ClickClickClick.com[/url] autoer. The script would need to find the button, insert the points and be able to run while the button is changing from side :).
Thanks, BoomBamBoom.

item.title: ClickClickClick
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I made that script yesterday
And you didn’t change a single thing in it…

and for that game, all you would need to do is change the procedure ‘ClickColor’ to

begin
movemouse(470,300);
Clickmouse(470,300, true);
end;

the button never changes…(I think). therefor itemcolor is irrelevant

then change the speed to ‘0’. It will get around 120 clicks per second

Read full topic

item.title: ClickClickClick
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

//   You can edit the wait time in ClickColor procedure if you want    //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SimpleAutoClicker;

var
x, y: Integer;
const
itemcolor= 50687;    //Place color here.
speed= 20;         //Speed in Miliseconds between clicks

Procedure ClickColor;
  begin
  FindColor(x, y, itemcolor,0,0,549,399);
  wait(0);
  MoveMouse(x, y);
  Clickmouse(x, y, true);
  end;

Begin
Cleardebug
repeat
ClickColor;
Wait(speed);
until(false);
End.

Script can’t insert though.

I forgot who I got this from, but I changed it a bit.

I think this only word when the ‘Click!’ button is the the left.

Read full topic
